name: Marvel vs. Capcom 3 Guide
description:
*** PLEASE NOTE - THIS IS FOR THE ORIGINAL MARVEL VS. CAPCOM 3 GAME - IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR THE ULTIMATE MARVEL vs. CAPCOM 3 GUIDE, CHECK OUT MY OTHER APPS AS I HAVE NOW RELEASED IT!!! ***

The Marvel vs. Capcom 3 Guide is the one and only GODLIKE way to have all of your MVC3 needs in the palm of your hands at all times, including when you have no network connection! This is the ONLY guide that includes all of the moves and hyper combos for all 38 characters, beginner, intermediate, and advanced combos for each and every character, and a notes section so you can keep matchup notes or create your own combos and save them!

If you like this app please give it a good rating!!!

And the best part is, you can look at this virtually while you are playing a match! There is no need to pause the game to look through menus, or exit online versus mode just to look at moves. You don't have to go look on your computer or flip through pages to find out some combos or information. You just have to look at your device right next to you! You can do it between matches, at the load screens, WHENEVER!

There is absolutely NO need to have any wireless or network connection once you have this app. You can use it at any tournament in a hotel, in someone's basement, or on the subway to your buddies house to play MvC3, all where signals can be weak!

The Retina Display images give the crisp look you desire on your 4th gen iOS devices!

Below is the list of features that are included in the app for each of the 36 characters.

* Vitals page, with information including health, combo type, assists, and command attacks.
* Special Moves
* Hyper Combos.
* 7 total combos (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced), for a total of over 250 combos!
* Frame and Damage data for all 38 characters!
* Notes section so you can take seperate matchup notes or specific combos

If you would like to see a video of the app in action so you know exactly what you will be getting, please check out the following link.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=49IDcO0DJ_k

So step your game up and grab this app! Put your friends on blast by showing off how much more knowledge you have about MVC3 than they do. OCV an entire team at your next tourney!

If you want to play like the pros, you have to have the knowledge of the pros! There is no better way to have it than in the palm of your hands at all times, even if you are in an area that is pitch black with no wireless signal!

This app has been created by the diehard fighter fan, for the diehard fighter fan. Maybe we'll even run into eachother on Xbox Live or PSN. It will be constantly maintained when new information or characters become available. Any new DLC characters WILL be added to the app!

SO GET YOUR MARVEL VS CAPCOM 3 STRATEGY GUIDE ON!!
